label: Biotechnologist
Developer
Data Scientist
Bioinformatician
basics.summary: I'm Ramin Yazdani, a data science enthusiast deeply passionate about biotechnology and bioinformatics. Currently expanding my knowledge at Saarland University, I thrive on using programming and data analysis to drive impactful research. My background in biotechnology and experience in bioinformatics projects fuel my commitment to exploring innovative solutions and uncovering insights from complex data. As a team player, I eagerly contribute and learn in collaborative environments. Beyond my technical pursuits, I'm improving my German and embracing new challenges.

experiences.description: Developed and maintained diverse web applications, backend & frontend components, and automated data workflows.

experiences.primaryFocus: Omics-Based Analysis of Microbial Genomes/Fermentation and Bioprocessing
experiences.description: Performed bioinformatics analyses, gene expression profiling, functional annotation, and bioprocess optimization.
Co-founded and established the company, led business development and partnerships.

experiences.role: Research Assistant - Biotechnology Laboratory / Fermentation Engineering
experiences.institution: University of Tehran / Rahpouyan Fanavar Sadegh
experiences.description: Worked on Pichia pastoris fermentation optimization and bioprocess engineering projects.
Oversaw operations, strategic planning, and business development for the family trading business.

projects.title: Integrated Omics Pipeline for Microbial Genomics
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive pipeline integrating metagenomic, transcriptomic, and proteomic data for functional gene analysis and microbial community profiling.

projects.title: Policy Compliance Checker (Flask + React + SQLite)
projects.description: Built a FReMP stack web application to upload dynamic security policies and user datasets (JSON/CSV), evaluate per-user compliance server-side, and present filterable/exportable pass/fail results with explanations in a React UI.

projects.title: Cosmetic Shop Marketplace Template (Django)
projects.description: Built a multi-app Django 4.1 marketplace template for a cosmetics shop with a reusable Core layer (centralized field factories, base models with soft-delete, shared mixins, and a custom app scaffolding command), plus product catalog listing/search/filtering, cart & checkout flow, and order/payment/shipment models rendered with Bootstrap templates on SQLite.

projects.title: Cosmetic Shop Marketplace Template (Django)
projects.description: Built a multi-app Django 4.1 marketplace template for a cosmetics shop with a reusable Core layer (centralized field factories, base models with soft-delete, shared mixins, and a custom app scaffolding command), plus product catalog listing/search/filtering, cart & checkout flow, and order/payment/shipment models rendered with Bootstrap templates on SQLite.

projects.title: Maktab 78 File Store (Framework-less Python + PostgreSQL)
projects.description: Developed an educational, framework-less Python project featuring a nested CLI router/menu system with dynamic callbacks, a lightweight PostgreSQL persistence layer (psycopg2) with small ORM-like models and query builders for CRUD, and domain modules for users, files, comments, carts, and order items.

projects.title: Python Bootcamp Portfolio — Maktab 78 Assignments & Projects
projects.description: Compiled and documented a monorepo of Python Bootcamp coursework and projects, organized by homework modules (fundamentals, OOP, system scripting, data validation, databases with PostgreSQL/MongoDB, and Flask REST APIs), including multiple major subprojects in a single structured repository.

projects.title: IranDoc Ganj Research Paper & Thesis Scraper (Selenium + BeautifulSoup)
projects.description: Developed a Python web-scraping tool using Selenium and BeautifulSoup to crawl ganj.irandoc.ac.ir year-by-year (and page-by-page when needed), extract thesis/paper metadata (e.g., subject, type, course, year, university, contributors) with UTF-8 Persian support, and export the results to CSV with an additional CSV cleaning utility.

projects.title: Personal CV Website (Django + React)
projects.description: Built a personal CV website with a React single-page frontend and a Django backend for data storage and API services, showcasing skills, projects, and professional experience in a web format.

projects.title: Movie/TV Discovery & Personalization App (React + Express + MySQL)
projects.description: Built a full-stack movie/TV discovery and personalization monorepo with a React client (Redux Toolkit, Material UI) and an Express server backed by MySQL, integrating Firebase Auth and OMDb/TMDb metadata APIs to support per-user favorites, ratings, reviews, and recommendation requests via a REST API.

projects.title: Hospital Database Management System (MySQL + SQL)
projects.description: Developed a MySQL hospital database schema for managing patients, doctors, services, departments, surgeries, and visits, providing SQL scripts to create tables, insert sample records, and generate multiple report views, alongside an ERD for documentation.

projects.title: Terminal Calculator (TUI) — Python
projects.description: Developed a Python 3.10 terminal calculator (TUI) with safe expression evaluation, command history (view/replay), and light/dark theming using Rich + prompt_toolkit, packaged as a CLI with pytest tests and GitHub Pages documentation.

projects.title: CV Generator — JSON → Awesome-CV PDF (Jinja2 + XeLaTeX)
projects.description: Developed a Python-based CV generator that renders structured JSON into modular Jinja2+LaTeX section templates using the Awesome-CV class, then compiles polished PDFs via XeLaTeX with multi-CV batch support, optional profile photos, StrictUndefined validation, LaTeX-escaping helpers, and reliable intermediate-file cleanup.

projects.title: Python Projects Roadmap (Ongoing)
projects.description: Maintaining an ongoing curated roadmap of ~100 Python project ideas categorized by difficulty (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) to guide consistent practice and portfolio-building, alongside repository utilities (e.g., create_projects.py).

projects.title: Single-Cell & Spatial Transcriptomics Workflow
projects.description: Implemented analysis workflows for single-cell RNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics data, enabling cell type identification and trajectory inference.

projects.title: Bioprocess Optimization for Protein Production
projects.description: Optimized fed-batch fermentation processes for heterologous protein expression in Pichia pastoris, including pathway engineering and bioreactor management.

projects.title: Automation & Web Data Extraction Solutions
projects.description: Designed and deployed Python-based web crawlers and automation scripts for data extraction, cleaning, and processing from diverse online sources.

projects.title: Full-Stack Web Application for Data Visualization
projects.description: Built interactive dashboards and visualization tools using Django, React, and Plotly for scientific data representation and reporting.

projects.title: Machine Learning Applications in Bioinformatics
projects.description: Developed predictive models and clustering algorithms for biological data analysis, focusing on gene expression and classification tasks.

projects.title: Containerized Bioinformatics Workflows
projects.description: Deployed reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using Docker and Kubernetes for scalable and collaborative research environments.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline Implementation for Web Applications
projects.description: Configured and automated continuous integration and deployment pipelines using GitLab CI/CD and Docker for web applications, ensuring robust delivery workflows.

projects.title: Backend API Development for Data-Driven Applications
projects.description: Designed RESTful APIs with Django Rest Framework and FastAPI to serve as backends for data-driven applications, focusing on performance and scalability.

projects.title: Real-Time Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a real-time dashboard for monitoring and visualizing streaming data using React, WebSockets, and Plotly for interactive user experience.

projects.title: Full-Stack E-commerce Web Platform
projects.description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform integrating user management, product catalogs, and payment systems using Django, React, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Linux System Automation & Monitoring Scripts
projects.description: Created Bash and Python scripts for automating server maintenance tasks, log management, and resource monitoring on Linux-based systems.

projects.title: Cloud-Based Microservices Deployment
projects.description: Implemented microservices architecture and deployed containerized services on cloud infrastructure using Docker and Kubernetes.

projects.title: Robotics & Embedded Systems Developer — High School & Personal Projects (2011–2015)
projects.description: Microcontroller programming and robot development for student competitions; designed and built embedded robotics systems and control logic.
